org.resthub.core.test.dao

Class AbstractDaoTest<T,ID extends Serializable,D extends GenericDao<T,ID>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.resthub.core.test.AbstractTransactionalTest
      • org.resthub.core.test.dao.AbstractDaoTest<T,ID,D>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The model class managed by the generic DAO
    ID - The ID class of the model class managed by the generic DAO
    D - Your generic DAO class

    public abstract class AbstractDaoTest<T,ID extends Serializable,D extends GenericDao<T,ID>>
extends AbstractTransactionalTest
    Dao test base class in order to test your DAO extending GenericDao This can be usefull to do a quick check that everything is fine for basic CRUD functionnalities. Best practices are to separate these kind of automatic tests from your custom tests, that may use RESThub DbUnit integration, and that should implement the tests you will write.
